attributes.action: To STOP adding new Petitions for at least two weeks, as the previous ones are being pushed to the back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: STOP adding new Petitions that are completely unjustified. From now on any new Petitions that ARE warranted and completely justified should be put on hold for at least two weeks, as the previous ones are just being pushed to the back. There are so many to read, and by the time people go through them, the deadline is almost up.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
